metadata.Title: CVE-2021-3522 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
GStreamer before 1.18.4 may perform an out-of-bounds read when handling certain ID3v2 tags.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2021-3522` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-gst-plugins-base-1.0 - 1.18.4-2
gstreamer1.0-alsa - 1.18.4-2
gstreamer1.0-gl - 1.18.4-2
gstreamer1.0-plugins-base - 1.18.4-2
gstreamer1.0-plugins-base-apps - 1.18.4-2
gstreamer1.0-x - 1.18.4-2
libgstreamer-gl1.0-0 - 1.18.4-2
libgstreamer-plugins-base1.0-0 - 1.18.4-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: gst-plugins-base1.0 package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.18.4-2').
